Package serverSide

Server's side - Solution for the Restaurant's Problem, implementing the client-server model of type 2 (server replication) with static launching of the entities envolved.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ComHandler
    Definition of the service provider agent thread for this solution of the Restaurant's Problem, implementing the client-server model of type 2 (server replication) with static launching of the entities envolved.
    Kitchen
    General Description: Definition of the Kitchen Shared Region - monitor-based solution.
    KitchenAdapter
    Definition of the interface of the Kitchen shared region on this solution of the Restaurant's Problem, implementing the client-server model of type 2 (server replication) with static launching of the entities envolved.
    KitchenMain
    General description: The Restaurant Problem - monitor-based solution.

Package serverSide Description

Server's side - Solution for the Restaurant's Problem, implementing the client-server model of type 2 (server replication) with static launching of the entities envolved.
